title: 20 MIN QUEUES TURN TO 40 MINS SO HARSH RITO 20 MINS 2 MUCH
body: Ok so I was on low priority queue for 20 mins and i heard the match found sound and my graphics card stuffed up (trying not to swear).But anyway i had to go through the 20 mins again plus its a bit harsh how 20 mins x 5 queues = 100 mins = 1 h 40 min seriously riot and then there's the times like this when u just cant accept like when siv hd posted the thing crapccept but it wasnt official wat about times like those and then u have to go through the queue again seriously riot 5 times and then tose times when u cant accept plz think about this.

replies.body: OK RITO THATS ENOUGH LIEK SERIOUSLY I HAVEN'T LEFT A MATCH IN OVER 20 GAMES CHECK MY MATCH HISTORY AND THEN I LEAVE ONE GAME AND BAM 20 MIN QUEUES SERIOUSLY RITO FIX THIS CMON U DIDNT DO IT IN THE LATEST PATCH AND SERIOUSLY IF U CAN'T FIX IT JUST STOP USING IT ALL TOGETHER

GR8 SO TODAY MY INTERNET FUKED UP AND IT WOULDNT RECONECT WHEN THE INTERNET CAME BACK UP AND THEN I LEAVE RESIGN AND REJOIN AND THEN RIOT PUTS ME IN ANOTHER 5X 20 MIN LOW PRIORITY QUEUE PLZ RIOT IF UR GONNA MAKE THIS A THING MAKE IT LESS HARSH AND FIX ALL THE BULLCRAP THAT HAPPENS IN GAME THEN THINK ABOUT MAKING A LOW PRIORITY QUEUE SERIOUSLY IM GETTING LOW PRIORITY QUEUE FOR NOTHING NOW IT ISN'T EVEN FUNNY IT MAKES ME CRI ERRYTIM
Wow i just left 1 game and it wasn't my fault my charger broke and i was waiting for a replacement 3 dayz later i get it  and now i get 20 min queues... rly rito

Period marks are graceful things. I love seeing them in abundance; so beautiful.

There are currently known issues with Low Priority Queues resetting after they expire. Hopefully this will be fixed next patch.
